nodes.bodyText: Could we just remove this empty method?
I would prefer if we didn't explicitly document or throw a DAOException here. We want to keep the reliance on core as minimal as possible.
I know this is really picky, but we don't need this new line here.
It would be nice to have some JavaDoc remarks on these two methods. See, e.g., the PatientTranslator.

nodes.bodyText: This could be a one-liner, i.e., fhirTask.setId(openmrsTask.getUuid());
Similar comments apply to this method.
Preconditions should be inside the changeSet, before the comment.
I think this also needs an id field.
